TEXT.TITLE: DIAMOND SHAMROCK <DRM> RAISES CRUDE POSTINGS
TEXT.BODY: Diamond Shamrock R and M said it raised its crude oil contract prices by 50 cts a barrel, effective June 17. The company said its new posting for West Texas Intermediate crude is 19 dlrs a barrel. The price increase follows similar moves by several other companies. Reuter
